Plot: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
Title: The Ring
Actors: Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson, David Dorfman, Brian Cox
tomatoConsensus: With little gore and a lot of creepy visuals, The Ring gets under your skin, thanks to director Gore Verbinski's haunting sense of atmosphere and an impassioned performance from Naomi Watts.
